summary: An ordinance relating to the Water Department; providing for the construction of watermains in East 80th Street from 20th Avenue Northeast to 30th Avenue Northeast, and from 35th Avenue Northeast to 40th Avenue Northeast, and in certain other streets and avenues, in order to provide or additional supply to the northeast section of the City; appropriating money from the Water Fund therefor; repealing Ordinance No. 80517; and ratifying and confirming any acts and expenditures made by virtue of said Ordinance No. 80517.
